name: Camlist
headline: The super app for pets
description: Camlist is the super app for pets, a video-first, mobile-only, social platform that allows pet breeders and pet parents to interact, transact, and care for their furry friends all under one roof.

founders.name: Moustafa Mahmoud, Founder
founders.description: 3x Technical Founder, 15 years in tech. On a mission to empower the world to buy and sell through video.

raw_markdown='[ The safest way to find your dream pet The safest way to find your dream pet ](https://www.camlist.com/<https:/www.camlist.com/> "The safest way to find your dream pet")
[](https://www.camlist.com/<#>)
## Camlist
# THE SAFEST WAY TO FIND YOUR DREAM PET
We are building a new standard in rehoming pets with safety and animal welfare as the primary focus
[ App Store ](https://www.camlist.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/ae/app/camelan/id1490601854>)
[ Google Play ](https://www.camlist.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.camelan>)
![Camlist - everything pets](https://www.camlist.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/Mockup-2048x1783.png?x64931)
# THE SAFEST WAY TO FIND A PET
![](http://jahangirseven.com/genoabase/wp-content/uploads/sites/11/2019/07/refresh-2.png)
## WATCH VIDEOS
All listings are video to ensure you see everything as it is in real life
![](https://www.camlist.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/chat-1.png?x64931)
## CHAT SAFELY
You can chat with any breeder directly in the app safely and securely
![](http://jahangirseven.com/genoabase/wp-content/uploads/sites/11/2019/07/record-circular-button.png)
## SAFE PAYMENT
You can pay directly in the app and your money is 100% protected. You can also use our 0% financing option
###  100% Free 
There is absolutely no cost whatsoever for breeders to use Camlist, and there never will be!
###  Video Listings 
You can see a video of any pet posted on the app, and you can do live video calls with any breeder to see the pets live
![Camlist - everything pets](https://www.camlist.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/Mockup-1024x892.png?x64931)
###  Safety first 
With our industry leading Protection Program we ensure animal welfare, and safety of our buyers
###  All Mobile 
You will never need to use your laptop for anything, do everything you need using our app on your phone
Downloads
0 +
Satisfied users
0 +
Videos
0 +
## Testimonials
## What pet parents say
![elite pets](https://www.camlist.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/elite-pets-e1737639470379.jpg?x64931)
## Treasa Laska
 __ __ __ __ __ 5/5
“Never had to leave the app to get my kitten. Chatted with the seller and paid on the app. The team was very helpful especially when I had to make the payment.”
![exotic](https://www.camlist.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/exotic-e1737639491617.png?x64931)
## Victor Destime
 __ __ __ __ __ 5/5
“I can’t believe that we can pay in instalments! I would never have been able to get my puppy if it wasn’t for this option.”
## Download Camlist now !
Forget the unsafe and complex process of finding a pet on the current classified websites, the numerous scams, endless WhatsApp messages, and frustrations. Experience the best way of finding your dream pet today.
[ App Store ](https://www.camlist.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/ae/app/camelan/id1490601854>)
[ Google Play ](https://www.camlist.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.camelan>)
![Camlist - everything pets](https://www.camlist.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/Mockup-1024x892.png?x64931)

generated_description:
**Camlist: Your Gateway to Finding the Perfect Pet**

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W21, Camlist is revolutionizing how pet enthusiasts connect. Based in London, this nimble team of five has created a video-first mobile app designed to ensure that finding your dream pet is both safe and straightforward.

### Mission-Driven Approach
Camlist aims to be "The super app for pets." Its focus is on safety and welfare, establishing a new standard in pet rehoming. Whether you're a seasoned pet parent or a first-time buyer, the platform caters to everyone, promoting a trusted community for pet transactions.

### Key Features
1. **Video Listings**: Every pet is presented through video, allowing potential owners to see their future furry friends in real life.
2. **Secure Chat**: Communicate directly with breeders within the app, ensuring a safe exchange.
3. **Payment Protection**: Transactions are secured within the app, with options for 0% financing available to help manage costs.
4. **100% Free for Breeders**: There's no charge for breeders, which encourages more transparency and diversity in listings.

### Why Camlist Stands Out
Camlist addresses common pain points in the pet adoption landscape—namely, the scams and frustrations often associated with current classified platforms. Testimonials from satisfied users emphasize its user-friendliness; one parent praised the app for allowing seamless communication and payments without ever leaving the platform.

### Download and Join the Community
Don't let the chaos of traditional pet searching deter you. Camlist provides a streamlined process that prioritizes user experience. Check it out on [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/ae/app/camelan/id1490601854) or [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.camelan).

In a world where finding a pet should be joyful rather than cumbersome, Camlist offers a refreshing alternative—a safe, mobile-first solution that brings together pet lovers with just a few clicks. 

For more information, visit [Camlist's website](https://www.camlist.com) and discover how easy pet rehoming can be.
